mapper.select: select diary_no as no, minihome_no as miniHomeNo, diary_title as title, diary_content as content, diary_secret as secret, diary_hit_cnt as hitCnt, diary_comment_cnt as commentCnt, diary_like_cnt as likeCnt, diary_deleted as deleted, diary_created_date as createdDate from minihome_diaries where diary_no = #{value} and diary_deleted = 'N'

select diary_no as no, minihome_no as miniHomeNo, diary_title as title, diary_content as content, diary_secret as secret, diary_hit_cnt as hitCnt, diary_comment_cnt as commentCnt, diary_like_cnt as likeCnt, diary_deleted as deleted, diary_created_date as createdDate from (select row_number() over(order by a.diary_created_date desc) rn, a.* from minihome_diaries a where a.minihome_no = #{value} and diary_deleted = 'N') where rn = 1

select diary_no as no, minihome_no as miniHomeNo, diary_title as title, diary_content as content, diary_secret as secret, diary_hit_cnt as hitCnt, diary_comment_cnt as commentCnt, diary_like_cnt as likeCnt, diary_deleted as deleted, diary_created_date as createdDate from minihome_diaries where minihome_no = #{miniHomeNo} and diary_created_date >= #{start} and diary_created_date <= #{end} order by diary_no desc
